name: House Out of Time
description:
***The web version will not load on Mac***

There is a bug in Godot 4 breaking Mac HTML5 support. There is a windows version available that should be playable with the Itch app if Wine is installed system wide.

Fix up an old foreclosed house to give it a new beginning!  Clean, repair, and decorate the rooms long out of fashion.
Learn more about the former owners through what they left behind including music they've made.  Featuring 3 original songs, a radio drama, a food advice show, and more!  Travel out of time and into the 1890s, the 1930s, and the 1980s. 

Sorry for any inconvenience! 

Jason Rand - Programming, UX, Jack

Catherine Rand - Art

DanzMacabre - Music, SFX, Various Voices

Jillian Wagner - Story,  Various Voices, SFX

Art was made in part with Stable Diffusion

"A Long Dame's Journey Into Night" written in part by ChatGPT and edited by Jillian Wagner
